en.start: Hello! Please use /add AMOUNT [n/k] CATEGORY to add an expense.
en.invalid_amount: Invalid amount. Please use a numerical value, e.g., 150.
en.invalid_suffix: Invalid suffix. Use 'n' for cash or 'k' for card.
en.unknown_command: Unknown command. Use /add to add an expense.
en.select_language: Please select your language: /lang en or /lang ru.
en.help_message:
Available commands:
/start - Start the bot
/add amount payment_method category - Add an expense
/budget - Show today's budget
/lang en|ru - Set language
/help - Show this help message
